titles.title: ni vipaji twaleta kwako baba mwenyezi ee baba pokea

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: ni vipaji twaleta kwako baba mwenyezi ee baba pokea

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: mkate na divai pokea baba mazao ya mashamba upokee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
zigeuze kuwa mwili pokea baba
na damu yake Kristu upokee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
watoto wetu baba pokea baba
familia zetu baba upokee
